00028 #ifndef OGRE_GLSUPPORT_H
00029 #define OGRE_GLSUPPORT_H
00030 
00031 #include "OgreGLPrerequisites.h"
00032 #include "OgreGLRenderSystem.h"
00033 
00034 #include "OgreRenderWindow.h"
00035 #include "OgreConfigOptionMap.h"
00036 #include "OgreGLPBuffer.h"
00037 
00038 namespace Ogre
00039 {
00040     
00041 class _OgreGLExport GLSupport
00042 {
00043 public:
00044     GLSupport() { }
00045     virtual ~GLSupport() { }
00046 
00052     virtual void addConfig() = 0;
00053 
00054     virtual void setConfigOption(const String &name, const String &value);
00055 
00060     virtual String validateConfig() = 0;
00061 
00062     virtual ConfigOptionMap& getConfigOptions(void);
00063 
00064     virtual RenderWindow* createWindow(bool autoCreateWindow, GLRenderSystem* renderSystem, const String& windowTitle) = 0;
00065 
00067     virtual RenderWindow* newWindow(const String &name, unsigned int width, unsigned int height, 
00068         bool fullScreen, const NameValuePairList *miscParams = 0) = 0;
00069 
00070     virtual bool supportsPBuffers();
00071     virtual GLPBuffer *createPBuffer(PixelComponentType format, size_t width, size_t height);
00072 
00076     virtual void start() = 0;
00080     virtual void stop() = 0;
00081 
00085     const String& getGLVendor(void) const
00086     {
00087         return mVendor;
00088     }
00089 
00093     const String& getGLVersion(void) const
00094     {
00095         return mVersion;
00096     }
00097 
00101     bool checkMinGLVersion(const String& v) const;
00102 
00106     virtual bool checkExtension(const String& ext) const;
00110     virtual void* getProcAddress(const String& procname) = 0;
00111 
00115     virtual void initialiseExtensions();
00116 
00118     virtual unsigned int getDisplayMonitorCount() const
00119     {
00120         return 1;
00121     }
00122 
00123 protected:
00124     // Stored options
00125     ConfigOptionMap mOptions;
00126 
00127     // This contains the complete list of supported extensions
00128     set<String>::type extensionList;
00129 private:
00130     String mVersion;
00131     String mVendor;
00132 
00133 }; // class GLSupport
00134 
00135 } // namespace Ogre
00136 
00137 #endif // OGRE_GLSUPPORT_H
